product_name: Ultimate Direction AK Race Hydration Vest - Men's
long_description: Winner of a 2014 Trail Runner Magazine Gear of the Year Award and designed by a champion of minimalism, the men's Ultimate Direction AK Race Hydration Vest gives you just what you need for your run.
short_description: Winner of a 2014 Trail Runner Magazine Gear of the Year Award and designed by a champion of minimalism, the men's Ultimate Direction AK Race Hydration Vest gives you just what you need for your run.
